description: User sends a message and receives AI response
steps: Type a message in the input field
Press Enter or click send button
Verify user message appears in conversation
Verify response is complete when streaming finishes

description: User sends message with file attachment
steps: Verify file previews appear in input area
Verify message with attachments is sent

description: User views message history on chat page load
steps: Have an existing chat with messages
Verify all previous messages are loaded
Verify scroll button appears when scrolled up

description: AI response shows reasoning when available
steps: Send a message that triggers reasoning
Verify reasoning section appears with expandable toggle

description: AI response shows tool calls when executed
steps: Send a message that triggers tool use

description: AI response shows sources when available
steps: Send a message that returns sources

description: Error during AI response shows error alert
steps: Trigger an error condition during AI response
Verify error alert appears with message
Verify user can still send new messages
